# remoteHandleUpdates

**Instance Property**

An asynchronous sequence of remote handle updates produced by this service.

## Declaration

```swift
final var remoteHandleUpdates: some AsyncSequence<RCSService.RemoteHandleUpdate, Never> { get throws }
```

## Discussion

Use a `for`-`await`-`in` loop to receive [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/RemoteHandleUpdate] instances from this property.

## Receiving handle updates

- **RCSService.RemoteHandleUpdate**: A structure that contains information about an update to a remote handle.
